column2: Open the terminal and run 'sudo dnf upgrade' to update software packages.

column1: How to enable fractional scaling on Wayland?
column2: Run the command 'gsettings set org.gnome.mutter experimental-features "['scale-monitor-framebuffer']"' and set the scale in Displays.

column1: How to enable tap-to-click on touchpad?
column2: Go to Mouse and Touchpad settings, select Tap to Click under Clicking.
